news: - Chrezbot now in typescript (yey!)
- Updating `Chrez help`, now you can check a help command individually (instead of all in one menu): try `Chrez help math`
- Adding slash commands, you can now use slash (/) to interact with chrezbot
- removing daily reminder as it is unecessary
bugfix: - No bugfix yet since it's still fresh from the oven

news: - upgrading Chrez update so it can show versions
bugfix: - change prefix from cb to Cb
- change bulkdelete so the return message will be deleted in 10 seconds
- remove the name label on Chrez time embed (you still can see it on slash command)

news: - Added more quote variety
- Quote now have their author discord icon
- Added nsfw option to Chrez meme
- Chrez cursed now can be accessed only on nsfw channel
- Chrezbot can now tells when someone is having a birthday soon
- added /roshambo (rock paper scissor) game
bugfix: - added reply when having connection issue

news: - Chrez time can now accept @mentions
bugfix: - added reply when having connection issue

news: - changing inline command to just messages instead of embed (less annoying)
- adding more private command
- fix the bug on birthday message
- Chrez calculate now send results in unit when you use unit in calculation (e.g: 2k + 3k = 5k)
- Added more people that can use private command
- added /mute to silent chrezbot from saying inline commands
bugfix: - fix error can't delete message using /bulkdelete

news: - added more quote variety
- added Chrez help for private members
- added more alias for Chrez time
- added Chrez help for private commands (private members only!)
- added more memes and cursed photos
- added more story
- added more story
- added "test" inline
- minor update to chrezbot system
- improvement on chrezbot architecture
currently still working on changing the system to newer one
- added more command
- known error now will be labeled in orange color
- performance update
bugfix: - fix all command labeled experimental on "Chrez help"

news: - added Chrez unmute
- added more commands
- chrezbot will now ignore messages longer than 100 words (previously 300)
- minor system improvements
bugfix: - fix bug chat command for bulkdelete not working

news: - added Chrez recommend
- you can add a new recommendation via /addrecommend (private members only)
bugfix: - fixed bug on Chrez unmute not working

news: - added coldown timer for inline command for each user
- increasing the criteria for some inline command to trigger
- Chrez agree, Chrez disagree, and Chrez laugh has been moved to public commands

- Added new alias for Chrez help, Chrez manual
